title.narrative: Country Programme 2016-2020. SBE Thematic Programme: Support to Basic Education

description.narrative: The thematic programme will have the objective of improving access to and quality of basic education for all children. It will focus on the right to basic education for all school age children. The programme will thus support national efforts to increase access to and quality of formal primary education and, in recognition of the complexity of the situation in hard-to-reach areas, assist in improving complementary systems within an inclusive, relevant and accredited education system. It will also work on strengthening the systems and human resources in the Ministry of Education in managing and implementing education programmes.
